meanings.definition: The act of packaging items in polybags.
meanings.sent1: Polybagging helps keep products safe during transportation.
meanings.sent2: I learned about polybagging in my packaging class.
meanings.sent3: The polybagging of the toys made them look like little presents.
meanings.sent4: Her room was a sea of polybagging, with items neatly stored in plastic bags.
meanings.sent5: The efficiency of polybagging made the packaging process much smoother.

meanings.definition: The process of enclosing products in plastic bags for protection during shipping.
meanings.sent1: Polybagging is essential for ensuring items arrive undamaged.
meanings.sent2: The company invested in polybagging equipment to improve shipping procedures.
meanings.sent3: The polybagging of the fragile glassware prevented any breakages.
meanings.sent4: The concept of polybagging products was like giving them a protective hug.
meanings.sent5: The bright colors of the polybagging made the packages easy to spot.

meanings.definition: The practice of using polybags for packaging and storing goods.
meanings.sent1: Polybagging is a common method for organizing inventory.
meanings.sent2: The convenience of polybagging items made the warehouse more efficient.
meanings.sent3: She joked that polybagging was like giving each product its own little home.
meanings.sent4: The art of polybagging transformed the cluttered shelves into neat displays.
meanings.sent5: The transparency of polybagging allowed for easy identification of contents.
